title: Idea Flow
description: An idea generator and note-taking app powered by Gemini AI, get inspiration in seconds!

title: Physics Sandbox
description: A physics sandbox application that allows users to create and simulate physics scenes using matter.js.

title: Gemini Chat
description: A cli tool to chat with gemini from the comfort of your terminal!

title: OH Clone
description: A web design project that replicates the OH website with modern design principles and responsive layouts. Collaborative effort with Ayman Soliman.

title: Authenticated Todo
description: A todo list application that allows users to create, update, and delete tasks. Users can also sign up and log in to access their tasks.

title: Calculator App
description: A calculator application built using native technology.

title: Sultan Gym
description: A gym landing page that showcases the facilities, membership plans, and trainers available at Sultan Gym.

title: Weather App
description: A weather application built using TypeScript to provide current weather information.

title: Downloads Organizer Tool
description: An automation tool to organize your downloads on Windows folder using Python.
